root.name: Unlimited SaGa
root.description: The ninth main entry in the SaGa series, released by Squaresoft in 2002. Like previous SaGa games, the game is non-linear and open-ended, but unlike previous games, its gameplay resembles that of a table-top RPG.ReceptionFamitsu gave Unlimited SaGa decent scores: (8/8/8/7) or 31/40.Western critics, on the other hand, panned the game for the overly confusing gameplay mechanics even though they praised the soundtrack and art style. Despite this, the game has developed a small yet loyal following that likes the game for the same reasons others did not. Because of this, Unlimited SaGa can be considered a cult classic like previous games in the series.
